page.title: 07Teenager in Baston interview
page.content: We interviewed a boy of 16 who has lived in the same house in the village for the last 12 years. Five people live there including a merchandizer and engineer, and 2 other children. During the 12 years{village life}has not changed,much to his disgust. He does not like living there and he finds the other{teenagers}uncongenial. He does not like the company in the public houses. The{bus service}to Peterborough is not too bad but he feels a car is an essential. He shops occasionaly in the village shop, of which he approves. He finds that most of the villagers are friendly to newcomers, but about a quarter keep themselves to themselves. As there is nothing for his age group to do in the village he finds it boring and cannot wait to leave.
